params.name: connectedMemberIds
params.doc:
List of member IDs whose connections to the requested member
 will be retrieved.
 For multiple connections, format as
 `?connectedMemberIds=member-1-id&connectedMemberIds=member-2-id`.

docs.summary: Lists a member's follower or following connections to other members.

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc: The number of items to load

params.name: paging.offset
params.doc: number of items to skip in the current sort order

docs.summary: Lists members who follow the requested member.

docs.summary: Lists members who are followed by the requested member.

Triggered when a member unfollows another member.

members.name: memberId
members.doc: Member ID of the member whose status changed.

members.name: followedMemberId
members.doc: Member ID of the member being followed or unfollowed.

members.name: connectedMemberId
members.doc: Site member ID.

members.name: followedByMember
members.doc: Indicates if the listed member is followed by the requested member.

members.name: followingMember
members.doc: Indicates if the listed member is following the requested member.

members.doc: Member who is following the other member.
